arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo drops retirement hint after breaking another record in Portugal thrashing
arts.sum: Al-Nassr and Portugal goal machine Cristiano Ronaldo says that he is planning to retire "in one or two years", with the forward expected to compete at the 2026 World Cup.

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo gives new hint on when he will retire after extending record
arts.sum: Cristiano Ronaldo has suggested that retirement isn't necessarily on his radar and maintained as long as he remains motivated he will continue playing as he continues to contribute with Portugal

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo sends Ruben Amorim a heartfelt message as he begins life in charge of Man United
arts.sum: Cristiano Ronaldo (left) broke his silence on Ruben Amorim's (right) decision to become Manchester United's latest manager and sent a heartfelt message to his fellow countryman.

arts.ttl: Clarke 'still a little uptight' as Poland await
arts.sum: Steve Clarke is "still a little bit uptight" despite Scotland breaking their long winless run against Croatia at Hampden, but says his side will go to Poland hunting a hugely significant victory.

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo scores masterpiece bicycle goal and defies aging with Portugal
arts.sum: In the recent UEFA Nations League match between Portugal and Poland, Ronaldo led his team to a commanding 5-1 victory with two goals and an assist. During the Portuguese Football Federation gala, where he was awarded the Quina de Platino for his 200 appearances with the national team, Ronaldo shared his evolved perspective on his career goals.

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo breaks international record as Portugal star overtakes ex-Real Madrid teammate
arts.sum: Al-Nassr and Portugal star Cristiano Ronaldo breaks a men's international record thanks to the Selecao's 5-1 thrashing of Poland in the UEFA Nations League.

arts.ttl: Nations League roundup: Ronaldo doubles up as Portugal thrash Poland
arts.sum: Victory in Porto ensures group top spot Wins for Spain and Northern Ireland Cristiano Ronaldo scored twice as Portugal ensured a top-place finish in Nations League group A1 after beating Poland 5-1 in Porto. Ronaldo converted a penalty after Rafael Leão had given Portugal a second-half lead and the 39-year-old added his second with an overhead kick in the closing stages. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Remarkable Cristiano Ronaldo vs Xavi stat surfaces after Real Madrid legend’s brace
arts.sum: A staggering statistic, highlighting the historic longevity of former Real Madrid star Cristiano Ronaldo, has come to the fore on Friday. This comes owing to his latest exploits on the…

arts.ttl: Ronaldo grabs double as Portugal hammers Poland to progress in Nations League
arts.sum: Spain, which had already secured first place in Group A4, beat Denmark 2-1 in Copenhagen, and in the same group Serbia grabbed a late equalizer in Switzerland to condemn the Swiss to relegation into the second tier. Cristiano Ronaldo scored a penalty and an overhead kick as Portugal beat Poland 5-1 to guarantee a place in the Nations League quarterfinals on Friday.

arts.ttl: Ronaldo bicycle kick helps Portugal reach QFs
arts.sum: Portugal sealed a Nations League quarterfinal berth after a Cristiano Ronaldo double with a penalty and an overhead kick helped them hammer visiting Poland 5-1 in Group A1 on Friday.
